Uses of Class
org.s2let.AxisymmetricWaveletTransform

Packages that use AxisymmetricWaveletTransform
org.s2let   
 

Uses of AxisymmetricWaveletTransform in org.s2let
 

Methods in org.s2let that return AxisymmetricWaveletTransform
static AxisymmetricWaveletTransform AxisymmetricWaveletTransform.fromHarmonics(SphericalHarmonicTransform flm, int waveletParameter, int firstScale, boolean multires)
          Factory method to create a new axisymmetric wavelet transform through an exact tiling of harmonic space, from an input spherical harmonic transform (using S2LET native methods).
static AxisymmetricWaveletTransform AxisymmetricWaveletTransform.fromHealpixMap(PixelizedMap f, int waveletParameter, int firstScale, int bandlimit)
          Factory method to construct a axisymmetric wavelet transform from a pixelized map by doing the spherical harmonic transform and tiling the harmonic space to construct the wavelets.
static AxisymmetricWaveletTransform AxisymmetricWaveletTransform.fromMWMap(PixelizedMap f, int waveletParameter, int firstScale, boolean multires)
          Factory method to construct a axisymmetric wavelet transform from a pixelized map by doing the spherical harmonic transform and tiling the harmonic space to construct the wavelets.
 

Methods in org.s2let with parameters of type AxisymmetricWaveletTransform
static SphericalHarmonicTransform SphericalHarmonicTransform.fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform f_wav)
          Factory method to create an instance of spherical harmonic transform from a wavelet transform.
static PixelizedMap PixelizedMap.fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform wavelets, SamplingScheme sc)
          Simplified factory method to create a Pixelized map from a wavelet decomposition and a sampling scheme flag.
static PixelizedMap PixelizedMap.fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform wavelets, SamplingScheme sc, int nside)
          Factory method to create a Pixelized map from a wavelet decomposition, a sampling scheme flag and the resolution.
